domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

text:
Enjoying the great outdoors in this hot weather?

Don't create #litter.

Remember that bins aren't always available, especially in the countryside.
 
Play your part:
✅ Take a bag for your rubbish
❌ Don't leave rubbish next to a full bin
 
#StayAlert #Coronavirus #UKHeatwave https://t.co/2iXogwMWHG
